lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Sabres knew they had a prime opportunity to bust out of their goal-scoring slump and did just that in a 4-2 win over the Calgary Flames on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Sabres Score 3 Power-Play Goals in 4-2 Win Over Flames
headline.main: Sabres Score 3 Power-Play Goals in 4-2 Win Over Flames

snippet: The Buffalo Sabres knew they had a prime opportunity to bust out of their goal-scoring slump and did just that in a 4-2 win over the Calgary Flames on Monday night....
